name: StandardDateFilter

methods.name: getColumn
methods.description: Returns the API name of the standard date filter column.

methods.name: getDurationValue
methods.description: Returns duration information about a standard date filter, such as start date, end date, and display name and API name of the date filter.

methods.name: getEndDate
methods.description: Returns the end date of the standard date filter.

methods.name: getStartDate
methods.description: Returns the start date for the standard date filter.

methods.name: setColumn
methods.description: Sets the API name of the standard date filter column.

methods.name: setDurationValue
methods.description: Sets the API name of the standard date filter.

methods.name: setEndDate
methods.description: Sets the end date for the standard date filter.

methods.name: setStartDate
methods.description: Sets the start date for the standard date filter.

description: Contains information about standard date filter available in the reportâ€”for example, the API name, start date, and end date of the standard date filter duration as well as the API name of the date field on which the filter is placed.
